name: Unknown Prespective
description:
Disclaimer

Don't play this game if you easily get motion sickness. 

The goal of the game

There are two shapes in the wrong dimension, get these shapes in the same location to send them back to their right dimensions.  

Controls

WASD for moving
Q for picking up objects in the green sphere dimension.
E for picking up objects in the red cube dimension.
Mouse to look around.

Helpful advice

You spawn on a blue one plane in the level that's visible through both prespectives. Try to use this 1 plane to your advantage! And no there are not 2 blue planes, it's just a matter of perspective.
